title: Emerald Radiance Haaram: A Timeless Statement of Elegance
materials: Vivid Green). Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. Features a rigid gold band adorned with diamond clusters, leading to a central pendant with elaborate floral motifs. Exquisite emeralds are bezel-set amidst pave-set diamonds, creating a rich tapestry of light and color. Delicate gold beads dangle from the pendant adding a touch of movement.
occasions: and grand occasions. Can be styled for both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
as well as for adding a touch of regal elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: This Emerald Radiance Haaram is a masterpiece of modern design and traditional craftsmanship. The combination of vivid green emeralds and brilliant diamonds creates a captivating play of light. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and durability. A perfect heirloom piece, blending cultural significance with contemporary style.
